verbs.description: as vinatieri approaches [V: andersen] [ARG1: scoring record teammate] recalls great dane start at ben davis morten andersen first steps to nfl greatness started at ben davis when the senior from denmark with a soccer background showed up to football practice word had spread that there was a kid in town from far away who might be able to help the ben davis giants high school football team at the placekicking position andersen said in his pro football hall of fame induction speech last year ben davis andersen vinatieri football ben davis american football ben davis giants high school hall of fame morten andersen tim wilbur
